duties_responsibilities.duty: Designing, developing, and implementing custom software and database applications.
Collaborating with stakeholders and end users to gather requirements and ensure that the software meets their needs.
Working within an Agile development team to deliver releasable software in short sprint cycles.
Conducting code reviews and unit testing to ensure the quality of the software.
Optimizing applications for maximum speed and scalability.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
